name: Work Schedule Site
description1: Developed a work schedule site to manage shifts in Ramla's court house using Django framework, HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
description2: Later upgraded to TypeScript with NestJS, React and MongoDB.

name: Appointment Site
description1: Developed appointment web app for a barber shop using ExpressJS, React and MongoDB.

name: Degree calculator PWA
description1: Developed a degree calculator web app that supports for PWA for managing courses using  ExpressJS, React and MongoDB.

name: GTA V mod
description1: Developed a GTA V mod that adds a new menu to the game in C#.

name: telegram bot
description1: Developed a telegram bot that sends me a message with Udemy coupons every day in Python and mongoDB.
